cover.blurb: Everyone is so nice on the internet...

personal.tagline: Full stack life developer. Google search guru.

body: I'm a Biomedical computing student at Queen's University. Obsessed with the internet and in love with technology.

Ever since I realized the vastness of the internet and what one is capable of achieving with it, I've been hooked <small>(and a little overwhelmed)</small>. I'm always keen on learning about the latest in bleeding edge web tech whilst simultaneously working on personal projects that I find interesting.
I'm on a new path to physical, mental and intellectual growth.

Thus, I have developed a newly born addiction to Medium articles that motivate and inspire me to be the best version of myself. My other addictions include anime, fitness, food, hip-hop/trap music and gaming.

projects.title: 500px - Pop
projects.description: A minimalistic and beautiful photo viewer, showcasing the most popular photos from website 500px.com.

projects.title: N2K - Need to know
projects.description: Awarded the title for the "Best use of Natural Language Processing." during QHacks '17. N2K is a Chrome Extension / Web Application that runs political, sentimental and emotional analyses on articles on the web in real time.

projects.title: Dueler
projects.description: My fantasy/RPG take on RockPaperScissors, featuring enemies with unique AIs and awesome names. Created as a non-canvas HTML5 Web App and Game using React.js and Redux.

projects.title: Warble
projects.description: In collaboration with one of my best friends, we sought out to hack together an Omegle/Chatroullette clone with social media elements; implemented with peer2peer networking and WebRTC.

projects.title: uTunes
projects.description: A light weight desktop music application. With a custom tag feature and dynamic playlist generation; implemented in C++.
